tool.name: search potential targets of miRNAs

param.name: allow_gap
param.label: Allow gaps, optional, default 0, not allowed. 1 for allow

param.name: genome
param.label: Transcript library to search
param.help: Default is wheat IWGSC v1.1 (gene names has 02G), where the gene names are different from v1.0 (gene name is 01G): TraesCS1B02G018700 vs. TraesCS1B01G018700

param.name: blast
param.label: Check off target in the wheat genome?
param.help: If yes, will search the CS-RefSeqv1 for sequences with no more than 4 mismatches

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
Most of time, you only need to set the miRNA sequence you want to search. Other options I did not include here:
transcript_library => $opt_g, mismatches => 5, allow_gaps => 0, # 0 | 1 strand => 'rev', # fwd | rev | both remove_isoform => 1, one_hit_per_gene => 1, calculate_filter => 1, # 0 | 1 apply_filter => 1, # 0 | 1 calculate_folding => "passed", # all | passed | non folding_backend => "RNAcofold", # RNAup | RNAcofold temperature => 23, # 0 - 80 degree C cutoff => 70, # 0 to 99 relaxed => 1, # 0 | 1 flanking => 0, showdesc => 50, # 0 - any, 0 = off show_gene_length => 0, sort_mode => 'ea', # ea | ed | ga | gd | la | ld
Let me know if you are interested in some of these options, so I can add them here.
------
For more information go to : https://github.com/pinbo/amiRNA-galaxy
